reviewText: i am a big warren miller fan & finally got the disc's i wanted!! everynight is warren miller night at my house
Another winner by Warren Miller -- a must-have for every avid skier who enjoys watching the prowess of the most skilled  performing in breathtaking  natural scenery.  Signed --  Hobbs

I received this from Source Media Group and put it in my DVD Player. It would not read the DVD. Tried another DVD Player and still would not read the disk.
I tried it in a Computer and it did not see the DVD. The note on the screen said it did not exist.
This DVD was a waste of money. WILL NOT ORDER FROM SOURCE MEDIA GROUP AGAIN.

THE WARREN MILLER MOVIE IS EXCELLENT. I HAVE WATCHED IT ON VHS. IT IS A GREAT MOVIE! Source Media Group sold me a defective product!!!!
